charinfo.name: Hatake Kakashi
charinfo.description: The squad leader of Team 7, known as the Copy Ninja, Kakashi is a man who puts the life of his teammates above all else. Kakashi is able to copy the abilities of his enemies while using his own original technique, the Raikiri.

abilities.name: Sharingan Reflect
abilities.description: This turn any new harmful skill that targets Kakashi, that is not unique, will instantly be reflected back upon the character who used it. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Summoning: Ninja Dogs
abilities.description: Kakashi summons ninja dogs which bite an enemy. That enemy has their non-mental skills stunned for 1 turn. During this time 'Raikiri' will instantly kill that enemy.

abilities.name: Raikiri
abilities.description: An attack so strong it is said to cut lightning. This skill does 50 piercing damage to one enemy. If the enemy is affected by 'Summoning: Ninja Dogs' the enemy will be instantly killed.

abilities.name: Clever Hiding
abilities.description: This skill makes Hatake Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.
